entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: Yaxley is a balding wizard who helps Muggleborns escape, but is caught by Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is present in the scene and swears loudly when he sees two Reg Cattermoles.

entities.name: reg cattermole
entities.description: Reg Cattermole is a Ministry wizard who has been vomiting, but is now pale and wan. He comes running out of a lift.

entities.name: mary cattermole
entities.description: Mrs. Cattermole looks over her shoulder when she hears 'Mary!'

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is present in the scene and punches Yaxley, shouting that he has been helping Muggleborns escape.

relationships.description: Yaxley helps Muggleborns escape, but is caught by Harry.
Harry punches Yaxley for helping Muggleborns escape.
